mapper.sql: PDM_REL_ID, PA_ENTY_ID, PA_ATTR_ID, CH_ENTY_ID, CH_ATTR_ID, PDM_REL_PNM, PDM_REL_LNM, REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD, PA_OPT_TYP_CD, PA_SUBJ_ID, CH_SUBJ_ID, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert: insert /* WamPdmRelMapper.insert */ into WAM_PDM_REL (PDM_REL_ID, PA_ENTY_ID, PA_ATTR_ID, CH_ENTY_ID, CH_ATTR_ID, PDM_REL_PNM, PDM_REL_LNM, REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD, PA_OPT_TYP_CD, PA_SUBJ_ID, CH_SUBJ_ID, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID ) values (#{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert /* WamPdmRelMapper.insertSelective */ into WAM_PDM_REL
PDM_REL_ID,
PA_ENTY_ID,
PA_ATTR_ID,
CH_ENTY_ID,
CH_ATTR_ID,
PDM_REL_PNM,
PDM_REL_LNM,
REL_TYP_CD,
CRD_TYP_CD,
PA_OPT_TYP_CD,
PA_SUBJ_ID,
CH_SUBJ_ID,
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
RQST_DTL_SNO,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,

mapper.update:
update /* WamPdmRelMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAM_PDM_REL
PDM_REL_PNM = #{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_REL_LNM = #{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REL_TYP_CD = #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRD_TYP_CD = #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_OPT_TYP_CD = #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_SUBJ_ID = #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_SUBJ_ID = #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PDM_REL_ID = #{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ATTR_ID = #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ENTY_ID = #{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ATTR_ID = #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update /* WamPdmRelMapper.updateByPrimaryKey */ WAM_PDM_REL set PDM_REL_PNM = #{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_REL_LNM = #{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REL_TYP_CD = #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRD_TYP_CD = #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_OPT_TYP_CD = #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_SUBJ_ID = #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_SUBJ_ID = #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PDM_REL_ID = #{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ATTR_ID = #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ENTY_ID = #{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ATTR_ID = #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT /* WamPdmRelMapper.getPdmRelList */ A.* , B.FULL_PATH AS PA_SUBJ_PNM , C.PDM_TBL_PNM AS PA_ENTY_PNM , D.PDM_COL_PNM AS PA_ATTR_PNM , E.FULL_PATH AS CH_SUBJ_PNM , F.PDM_TBL_PNM AS CH_ENTY_PNM , G.PDM_COL_PNM AS CH_ATTR_PNM , U.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM FROM WAM_PDM_REL A INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ B ON A.PA_SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL C ON A.PA_SUBJ_ID = C.SUBJ_ID AND A.PA_ENTY_ID = C.PDM_TBL_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL D ON A.PA_ENTY_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID AND A.PA_ATTR_ID = D.PDM_COL_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON A.CH_SUBJ_ID = E.SUBJ_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL F ON A.CH_SUBJ_ID = F.SUBJ_ID AND A.CH_ENTY_ID = F.PDM_TBL_ID AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL G ON A.CH_ENTY_ID = G.PDM_TBL_ID AND A.CH_ATTR_ID = G.PDM_COL_ID AND G.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U2.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND (A.PA_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR A.CH_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT /* WamPdmRelMapper.getPdmRelHistList */ A.* , B.FULL_PATH AS PA_SUBJ_PNM , C.PDM_TBL_PNM AS PA_ENTY_PNM , D.PDM_COL_PNM AS PA_ATTR_PNM , E.FULL_PATH AS CH_SUBJ_PNM , F.PDM_TBL_PNM AS CH_ENTY_PNM , G.PDM_COL_PNM AS CH_ATTR_PNM , U.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#0000FF' END AS FontColor FROM WAH_PDM_REL A INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ B ON A.PA_SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL C ON A.PA_SUBJ_ID = C.SUBJ_ID AND A.PA_ENTY_ID = C.PDM_TBL_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL D ON A.PA_ENTY_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID AND A.PA_ATTR_ID = D.PDM_COL_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON A.CH_SUBJ_ID = E.SUBJ_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL F ON A.CH_SUBJ_ID = F.SUBJ_ID AND A.CH_ENTY_ID = F.PDM_TBL_ID AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL G ON A.CH_ENTY_ID = G.PDM_TBL_ID AND A.CH_ATTR_ID = G.PDM_COL_ID AND G.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U2.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE 1=1 AND (A.PA_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR A.CH_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ORDER BY A.EXP_DTM DESC, A.STR_DTM DESC

SELECT /* WamPdmRelMapper.getPdmRelListHistPage */ A.* , B.FULL_PATH AS PA_SUBJ_PNM , C.PDM_TBL_PNM AS PA_ENTY_PNM , D.PDM_COL_PNM AS PA_ATTR_PNM , E.FULL_PATH AS CH_SUBJ_PNM , F.PDM_TBL_PNM AS CH_ENTY_PNM , G.PDM_COL_PNM AS CH_ATTR_PNM , U.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM FROM WAH_PDM_REL A INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ B ON A.PA_SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAH_PDM_TBL C ON A.PA_SUBJ_ID = C.SUBJ_ID AND A.PA_ENTY_ID = C.PDM_TBL_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAH_PDM_COL D ON A.PA_ENTY_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID AND A.PA_ATTR_ID = D.PDM_COL_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON A.CH_SUBJ_ID = E.SUBJ_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAH_PDM_TBL F ON A.CH_SUBJ_ID = F.SUBJ_ID AND A.CH_ENTY_ID = F.PDM_TBL_ID AND F.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAH_PDM_COL G ON A.CH_ENTY_ID = G.PDM_TBL_ID AND A.CH_ATTR_ID = G.PDM_COL_ID AND G.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U2.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND (A.PA_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR A.CH_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT /* WamPdmRelMapper.getPdmRelHistListHistPage */ A.* , B.FULL_PATH AS PA_SUBJ_PNM , C.PDM_TBL_PNM AS PA_ENTY_PNM , D.PDM_COL_PNM AS PA_ATTR_PNM , E.FULL_PATH AS CH_SUBJ_PNM , F.PDM_TBL_PNM AS CH_ENTY_PNM , G.PDM_COL_PNM AS CH_ATTR_PNM , U.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#0000FF' END AS FontColor FROM WAH_PDM_REL A INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ B ON A.PA_SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAH_PDM_TBL C ON A.PA_SUBJ_ID = C.SUBJ_ID AND A.PA_ENTY_ID = C.PDM_TBL_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAH_PDM_COL D ON A.PA_ENTY_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID AND A.PA_ATTR_ID = D.PDM_COL_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON A.CH_SUBJ_ID = E.SUBJ_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAH_PDM_TBL F ON A.CH_SUBJ_ID = F.SUBJ_ID AND A.CH_ENTY_ID = F.PDM_TBL_ID AND F.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAH_PDM_COL G ON A.CH_ENTY_ID = G.PDM_TBL_ID AND A.CH_ATTR_ID = G.PDM_COL_ID AND G.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U2.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE 1=1 AND (A.PA_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR A.CH_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ORDER BY A.EXP_DTM DESC, A.STR_DTM DESC
